meanings.definition: Utter a high-pitched piercing sound or words in a high-pitched piercing tone.
meanings.sent1: The little girl was shrieking with joy when she saw the colorful balloons.
meanings.sent2: The fire alarm started shrieking loudly, causing everyone to evacuate the building.
meanings.sent3: The parrot started shrieking in a funny way, mimicking the sound of a car alarm.
meanings.sent4: The wind was shrieking through the trees, creating an eerie atmosphere in the forest.
meanings.sent5: Her shrieking laughter echoed through the empty hallway, making everyone smile.

meanings.sent1: The kettle on the stove was shrieking, signaling that the water was boiling.
meanings.sent2: The brakes of the car started shrieking as the driver suddenly stopped.
meanings.sent3: The old door was shrieking in protest every time it was opened or closed.
meanings.sent4: The microphone was shrieking feedback during the live performance, causing a disturbance.
meanings.sent5: The seagulls were shrieking loudly by the shore, adding to the coastal ambiance.
